overview: Here’s a classic video that’s become a staple in New York City Skate and Hip Hop culture.  Legends in the realms Hip Hop and Skateboarding – Harold Hunter, Jeff Pang, Vinny Ponte, DJ Roc Raider, Bobbito, Wu-Tang Clan, Jay-Z & Busta Rhymes are just some of the names that made this historic visual mainstay possible.
title: Zoo York Mixtape
